mapper.select: select p.proposal_id AS proposalId, p.proposal_title AS proposalTitle, p.proposal_content AS proposalContent, to_char(p.proposal_create,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS proposalCreate, p.proposal_status AS proposalStatus, m.member_name AS memberName from proposal p join member m on m.member_id=p.member_id ORDER BY proposal_id DESC
mapper.insert: insert into PROPOSAL(proposal_id, proposal_title, proposal_content, member_id) values(proposal_seq.NEXTVAL, #{proposalTitle}, #{proposalContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.delete: delete proposal where proposal_id = #{proposalId} AND member_id = #{memberId}
